events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your online store, but I would like to request a refund because the size I received is incorrect and does not fit me at all.
The customer's issue has been categorized under 'Refund' as it involves requesting money back due to size issues with a recent purchase.
The case has been assigned to agent Sarah for further assistance and processing of the refund request.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I’m here to help you with your refund request for the jacket that doesn’t fit.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm whether the jacket is unused and in its original packaging so we can proceed with the refund?
My order number is 452789 and yes, the jacket is brand new with all tags attached and still in the original packaging.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate your refund process immediately and send you a prepaid shipping label to return the jacket.
That sounds good, thank you for the quick response and help with resolving my issue.
We have received the returned jacket and your refund has been processed. The amount should appear on your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that your refund was received and if you need any further assistance from us.
Since your refund was successful and no further issues were reported, we are now closing this case. Thank you for your patience and for choosing our store.
